General.Name: Metrogas SA
General.Description: MetroGAS S.A. distributes natural gas in Argentina. It serves approximately 2.5 million customers. The company was formerly known as Distribuidora de Gas Metropolitano SA. MetroGAS S.A. was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
General.Address: Gregorio ArAoz de Lamadrid 1360, Buenos Aires, Argentina
